imageurl.title: Dashboard
imageurl.description: Central dashboard providing an overview of job applications, profile completion status, saved jobs, and recent activity for both job seekers and recruiters.

imageurl.title: About
imageurl.description: Informational section describing the job portalâ€™s mission, features, company background, and how it helps candidates and employers connect efficiently.

imageurl.title: Responsibility
imageurl.description: Job responsibility details outlining roles, duties, required skills, and expectations for specific job positions posted by employers.

imageurl.title: Job List
imageurl.description: Comprehensive list of available job openings with key information such as job title, company name, location, experience level, and job type.

imageurl.title: Job Search
imageurl.description: Advanced job search feature allowing users to filter jobs by keyword, location, experience, salary range, and employment type.

imageurl.title: Contact
imageurl.description: Contact page enabling users to reach administrators or support teams for inquiries, feedback, or assistance related to jobs and accounts.

imageurl.title: Location
imageurl.description: Job location view displaying workplace addresses, city-wise job availability, and map-based job discovery for candidates.

imageurl.title: Registration
imageurl.description: User registration and profile creation module for job seekers and employers to sign up, manage resumes, and post job vacancies.

description: This project showcases a full-featured Job Portal application inspired by platforms like Indeed and Naukri. It includes job searching, job listings, detailed job descriptions, responsibilities, location-based job discovery, user registration, and dashboard management. The system is designed to connect job seekers with employers through a modern UI and efficient recruitment workflow.
